ShippingInstruction.description: Instructions and details for the carrier

shippingType.description: The shipping type, e.g. thick_envelope, small_flat_rate_box, large_package, etc.

carrierServiceCode.description: The service code used by the carrier to ship the package, royal mail ground, royal mail first class, etc

deliverySpeed.description: Shipping delivery speed, same day, next day, next business day, etc

deliveryAttempts.description: Shipping delivery attempts that should be performed

characteristic.description: Additional shipping characteristics that maybe specific to one or another carrier

warehouseId.description: The identification of the warehouse that the shipment is being shipped from.

receiptConfirmation.description: Delivery confirmation required for the shipment (none, signature, over18Signature)
